select music_info.id, music_info.code, music_info.name, music_info.total_time, music_info.album_id, music_info.images, music_info.singer_id, music_info.file_url, music_info.tag, music_info.type_id, music_info.content, music_info.create_date, singer_info.code as singerCode, singer_info.name as singerName, singer_info.images as singerImages, singer_info.`identity`, music_type_info.name as typeName, album_info.code as albumCode, album_info.name as albumName, album_info.images as albumImages from music_info left join singer_info on (singer_info.id = music_info.singer_id) left join music_type_info on (music_type_info.id = music_info.type_id) left join album_info on (album_info.id = music_info.album_id) where 1 = 1
AND music_info.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{musicInfo.name},'%')
AND singer_info.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{musicInfo.singerName},'%')
AND album_info.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{musicInfo.albumName},'%')
order by music_info.create_date desc

select music_info.id, music_info.code, music_info.name, music_info.total_time, music_info.album_id, music_info.images, music_info.singer_id, music_info.file_url, music_info.tag, music_info.type_id, music_info.content, music_info.create_date, singer_info.code as singerCode, singer_info.name as singerName, singer_info.images as singerImages, singer_info.`identity`, music_type_info.name as typeName, album_info.code as albumCode, album_info.name as albumName, album_info.images as albumImages from music_info left join singer_info on (singer_info.id = music_info.singer_id) left join music_type_info on (music_type_info.id = music_info.type_id) left join album_info on (album_info.id = music_info.album_id) where 1 = 1 order by music_info.create_date desc limit 6

SELECT DATE_FORMAT( spo.days, '%m-%d' ) AS days, IFNULL(COUNT(oi.id), 0) AS count FROM ( SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 0 DAY ) days UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 1 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 2 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 3 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 4 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 5 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 6 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 7 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 8 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 9 DAY )) spo LEFT JOIN music_play_record oi ON ( DATE_FORMAT( oi.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d' ) = DATE_FORMAT( spo.days, '%Y-%m-%d' ) ) GROUP BY days ORDER BY days ASC
